definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: When the snow melts, the mountain stream becomes a deluge.
sentences.chinese: 雪融化時，山間溪流變成山洪暴發。

sentences.english: In the Mogul garden, the chadhar idealizes the mountain and its stream.
sentences.chinese: 在莫臥兒人的花園中，跌水使山川和溪流變得更迷人。

sentences.english: The stream devolves from the mountains.
Known from a single stream in an isolated cloud forest.
sentences.chinese: 這種蛙類曾生活在一個與世隔絕的霧林的溪流內。

sentences.english: Under the bridge, there lies a valley between steep mountains with a rapid stream flowing through it.
sentences.chinese: 兩端之間，原隔着險峻的山谷，湍急的溪流。

sentences.english: Once the bauxite is gone, they fear, the streams will run dry.
sentences.chinese: 他們擔心一旦鋁土不在了，溪流將會乾涸。

sentences.english: This is one of the most interesting sight during the early summer in the …
sentences.chinese: 這是陽明山區初夏的溪流中有趣的景觀。

sentences.english: A frozen brook makes a good slide.
sentences.chinese: 結凍的溪流形成了一個好的光滑面。

sentences.english: Now these salmon only live in cold, high mountain streams.
sentences.chinese: 如今這些鮭魚只棲息於高山的冷冽溪流裏。

sentences.english: The gurgling brook washes my dusty mind.
The setting sun casts a warm glow over stream-filled valleys.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，在溪流潺潺的山谷上投下一縷溫暖的光輝。

sentences.english: Where the rivers run clear and the bracken is gold in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，溪流清澈明淨，水草在陽光下閃着金色的波光。

sentences.english: The brook meandered through the meadow.
We walked in the meadows, along the streams that watered them.
sentences.chinese: 我們在草地上順着灌溉他們的溪流走着。

sentences.english: Clouds float in the sky and a creek flows past the town.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩在藍天漂盪，小溪流過小鎮。

sentences.english: I am wearing a dress made of rainbow, dipping myself into the blue brook of time.
sentences.chinese: 我披一件彩霞，跳進了時間深處流淌藍色溪流中。
